name: Spray deodorant
title: Axe Ice Chill · Spray deodorant · 48h, 0% aluminum salts

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Parfum, Zinc Neodecanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: You're minding your own business and suddenly your crush comes in. You actually want to stay cool, but immediately stress sweat and rising body temperature set in and make you hot as hell. If only there was a suitable deodorant... A fantastic body spray for men that cools you down immediately and can lower the skin temperature by 6 degrees. So that you could stay cool when it counts... Now imagine the same situation, but you are prepared thanks to AXE Body Spray. Not only do you smell temptingly of Frozen Mint & Lemon, but you also have 48 hours of freshness on your side. And first-class antibacterial protection. Not only for your armpits, but for the whole upper body. This time your crush enters the room and you don't smell like a wet dog, but groomed as if you're fresh out of the shower. You're cooler than a polar bear's toes. Insecurity is replaced by self-confidence. Instead of panicking, you can stay cool. So, if you're looking for an aluminum-free deodorant that keeps you fresh longer and helps you just smell good - you've found it. AXE Ice Chill is also available as deodorant roll-on, after shave and as shower gel.

remarks.value: WARNHINWEISE: Aus nicht weniger als 15 cm Entfernung sprühen. Nicht auf gereizter oder verletzter Haut anwenden. Bei Auftreten von Hautirritationen nicht weiter verwenden. Direktes Einatmen vermeiden. Nur kurz sprühen und in gut gelüfteten Räumen verwenden, längeres Sprühen vermeiden. Kontakt mit Augen und Intimbereich vermeiden. Benutzung ausschließlich gemäß Verwendungszweck. Nur entleert entsorgen.
